plot: A police officer in critical condition has bizarre symptoms, and Dr. Foreman finds himself in an unpleasant situation.

During a routine arrest, a police officer is shot by Baby Shoes, a black street punk. Upon arrival at PPH, the officer is acting strangely, laughing and giddy. Cameron is still angry and hurt vis-a-vis Foreman, who reveals his deep-seated aversion for law enforcement. House sends Foreman to the officer's home and sends Chase and Cameron to perform tests. As the officer presents increasingly bizarre symptoms, House orders him quarantined. Foreman receives a nasty souvenir of his home visit and learns a lesson about true friendship.—LA-Lawyer
